ComicInfo.Title: Live from New York, It's Saturday Night!
ComicInfo.Summary: Spiderman teams up with the cast of SNL, after he and Mary Jane go to a taping of the series (with special guest host, Stan Lee). John Belushi, one of the show's cast members comes in pocession of a ring, that the Silver Samuari wants!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:51:38. [Issue ID 32701]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
